full_text: re BRAS IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2018/KER/738 PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA MONDAY, THE 8TH DAY OF JANUARY 2018 / 18TH POUSHA, 1939 Cr1.MC.No. 8922 of 2017 CC 348/2012 of JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-I,HOSDRUG CRIME NO. 56/2012 OF CHANDERA POLICE STATION, KASARGOD DISTRICT PETITIONER/ACCUSED 1 AND 2 : 1 FAISAL M.K., AGED 31 YEARS, (Al), S/O.KHALID T.K., MAVILA KADAPPURAM, PADANNA VILLAGE, HOSDURG TALUK, KASARAGOD DISTRICT. 2 ARAFATH M.K., AGED 30 YEARS, (A2), S/O.KHALID T.K., MAVILA KADAPPURAM, PADANNA VILLAGE, HOSDURG TALUK, KASARAGOD DISTRICT. BY ADVS.SMT .HEMALATHA SRI.BINU GEORGE RESPONDENT/STATE : 1. STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM. 2. SALJITH, AGED 47 YEARS, S/O.BALAN N.K., R/AT.PARAMBATHIDATH HOUSE, MELOOR, MELOOR P.O., DARMADAM VILLAGE, THALASSERY TALUK, KOLLAM DISTRICT. R1 BY SENIOR PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI.B.JAYASURYA R2 BY ADV. SMT.MARY RANZOM LOUIZ THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 08-01-2018,THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: bp Beer BER 2018/KER/738 Cr1.MC.No. 8922 of 2017 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' EXHIBITS =: ANNEXURE Al CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO.56/2012 OF CHANDERA POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE A2 CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FIRST REPORT IN CRIME NO.56/2012 OF CHANDERA POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE A3 AFFIDAVIT DATED 04.12.2017 SWORN BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT . RESPONDENT'S EXHIBITS : NIL. //TRUE COPY// P.A.TO JUDGE bp 2018/KER/738 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 8" day of January, 2018 ORDER Petitioners are the accused in CC No.348/2012 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Hosdurg, which has arisen from Crime No.56/2012 of Chandera Police Station for the offences punishable under Sections 341, 323, 324, 506(i) and 355 read with Section 34 IPC. 2. It seems that the matter has been amicably settled between the petitioners and the de_ facto complainant, who is the 2"? respondent herein. 3. The 2 respondent has filed Annexure-A3 affidavit affirming that the matter has been amicably settled between him and the petitioners and presently, he has no complaints against the petitioners. When the matter is settled between the parties, no purpose would be served in proceeding with the matter further. Matters being so, all = ieee 2018/KER/738 Crl.M.C.8922/2017 :2: further proceedings against the petitioners in CC No.348/2012 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Hosdurg, which has arisen from Crime No.56/2012 of Chandera Police Station, can be quashed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and all further proceedings against the petitioners in CC No.348/2012 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Hosdurg, which has arisen from Crime No.56/2012 of Chandera Police Station, are quashed. Sd/- (B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE) aks/08/01 1! True Copy // PS to Judge
